## 2. Key Technical Concepts

- **Ameureka L1-L4 四层业务架构**：
  - L1 数据层 (`src/db/schema.ts`) - Drizzle ORM
  - L2 逻辑层 (`src/actions/*.ts`) - next-safe-action + Zod
  - L3 桥接层 (`src/hooks/*.ts`) - TanStack Query
  - L4 视图层 (`src/components/*`) - React Hook Form + Shadcn/UI

- **UI组件三层设计体系**：
  - L1 基础原子层 (`components/ui/`) - 纯UI无业务逻辑
  - L2 业务领域层 (`components/[feature]/`) - UI+业务逻辑
  - L3 页面区块层 (`components/blocks/`) - 布局+组合

- **Vibe Coding 4步SOP**：Schema定义 → Action编写 → Hook封装 → View构建

- **v0混合开发方法论**："UI外包给AI，逻辑掌握在核心"

- **技术栈**：Next.js 15 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS 4 + Shadcn/UI + Drizzle ORM + Better-Auth + Zustand + TanStack Query

- **16类规则文件(.mdc)**：development-workflow, typescript, nextjs, react, drizzle-orm, tailwindcss, zod, react-hook-form, zustand, radix-ui, stripe, ai-sdk, date-fns, ui-components, database-state-management, project-structure

## 3. Files and Code Sections

### 核心方法论文档

**`ameureka Vibe Coding 核心方法论.md`**
- L1-L4四层架构完整定义
- 标准开发作业程序(SOP)
```
src/
├── actions/       # L2: Server Actions
├── app/           # Next.js App Router
├── components/    # L4: UI 组件
├── db/            # L1: 数据库Schema
├── hooks/         # L3: React Query封装
├── lib/           # 通用工具函数
└── [domain]/      # 领域模块
```

**`AMEUREKA-设计原则与标准.md`** (1957行)

**`Text Prompting.md`** (v0官方)

- 开发工作流：简单项目直接实现，复杂项目先PRD规划
- 渐进增强策略

**`v0-prompt-templates.md`**

**`PROJECT_SUMMARY_AND_STANDARDS.md`**

- Design Tokens强制使用语义化变量

    49→- `flows/*.md` - 10 个 Flow 文档
    50→- `checklists.md` - 验收清单
    51→
    52→### 阶段 3: 实施期
    53→
    54→**目标**: 使用 v0 逐模块生成代码，即时验证
    55→
    56→**关键任务**:
    57→1. **分段生成** - 按模块顺序单独生成
    58→2. **即时验证** - 对照 Checklist 逐条检查
    59→3. **版本控制** - 每个模块保存 checkpoint
    60→4. **手工收尾** - 关键区域手动接管代码
    61→
    62→**产出物**:
    63→- `components/*.tsx` - UI 组件
    64→- `lib/types/*.ts` - TypeScript 类型
    65→- `CHANGELOG.md` - 版本记录
    66→
    67→### 阶段 4: 验证期
    68→
    69→**目标**: 确保代码符合架构规范，达到生产就绪
    70→
    71→**关键任务**:
    72→1. **合规检查** - 对照 ameureka 规范逐条验证
    73→2. **技术评分** - shadcn/Tailwind/状态管理评分
    74→3. **集成准备** - API 端点预留、Mock 数据完整
    75→
    76→**产出物**:
    77→- `compliance-report.md` - 合规报告
    78→- `API_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md` - 集成指南
    79→
    80→---
    81→
    82→## 二、7 步执行闭环
    83→
    84→```
    85→分解 → 提示 → 生成 → 验证 → 调整 → 记录 → 下一模块
    86→  │      │      │      │      │      │         │
    87→  ▼      ▼      ▼      ▼      ▼      ▼         ▼
    88→Checklist Prompt  v0   对照   追加   CHANGELOG  重复
    89→```
    90→
    91→### Step 1: 需求分解
    92→- 将整页需求拆分为可验证的小模块
    93→- 每个模块对应 Checklist 条目
    94→- 示例: 导航、Hero、分类、结果、侧栏
    95→
    96→### Step 2: 提示词设计
    97→- 为每个模块创建独立 Prompt
    98→- 包含: 场景、技术栈、布局、状态、数据
    99→- 附加 ASCII 布局图和 JSON 示例
   100→
   101→### Step 3: v0 生成
   102→- 按模块顺序单独生成
   103→- 不一次性生成整页
   104→- 使用已导入的 Design System
   105→
   106→### Step 4: 即时验证
   107→- 对照 Flow 文档和 Checklist
   108→- 逐条检查 UI 元素和交互
   109→- 缺失项立即标记
   110→
   111→### Step 5: 追加调整
   112→- 缺失项追加指令修正
   113→- 不进入下一模块直到通过
   114→- 关键区域手动接管代码
   115→
   116→### Step 6: 版本记录
   117→- 保存版本标签 (如 "Built Flow01 nav v1")
   118→- 在 Chat 中标记完成状态
   119→- 更新 CHANGELOG
   120→
   121→### Step 7: 进入下一模块
   122→- 重复 Step 1-6
   123→- 直到所有模块完成
   124→- 最终整合页面
   125→
   126→---
   127→
   128→## 三、关键决策模式
   129→
   130→### 决策 1: 分段生成 vs 一次性生成
   131→
   132→```
   133→问题: v0 对长 Prompt 只解析前几段
   134→
   135→选项:
   136→A. 一次性生成整页 → 结果不可控
   137→B. 分段生成逐块验证 → 每块都符合预期 ✓
   138→
   139→选择: B
   140→原因: 条件越多越不符合预期，分段可逐块校验
   141→```
   142→
   143→### 决策 2: 负面提示词策略
   144→
   145→```
   146→问题: v0 修改 A 时可能影响 B、C、D
   147→
   148→选项:
   149→A. 只说要什么 → 可能改动其他部分
   150→B. 明确说什么不要动 → 精准控制范围 ✓
   151→
   152→选择: B
   153→示例: "不要更改 Hero 区、保持导航栏样式、其他部分保持不变"
   154→```
   155→
   156→### 决策 3: Mock/Real 双模式
   157→
   158→```
   159→问题: 后端未 Ready 时前端如何开发
   160→
   161→选项:
   162→A. 等后端完成 → 阻塞前端进度
   163→B. Mock 模式独立开发 → 前端可独立预览 ✓
   164→
   165→选择: B
   166→实现: 环境变量 NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_MOCK 切换
   167→```
   168→
   169→---
   170→
   171→## 四、ameureka 15 条规范
   172→
   173→### 框架与目录
   174→1. Next.js 15 App Router，`src/app` 下使用 `(group)`、`(api)` 划分
   175→2. 公共组件在 `src/components`，UI 基础件在 `src/components/ui`
   176→3. 业务逻辑在 `src/lib`、`src/hooks`，API 走 server actions
   177→
   178→### 代码风格
   179→4. TypeScript + ESLint/Biome，严格 `use client`/`use server`
   180→5. 2 空格缩进，PascalCase 组件，camelCase 变量
   181→6. 所有 props/数据结构写 interface
   182→
   183→### 样式/主题
   184→7. Tailwind 4 + OKLCH 颜色，`globals.css` 中的变量是权威来源
   185→8. 统一使用 CSS 变量 `bg-card`、`text-muted-foreground` 等
   186→9. 组件用 shadcn + Radix
   187→
   188→### 数据 & Mock
   189→10. Mock 数据统一放 `src/data` 或 `src/mocks`
   190→11. 所有状态 (loading/empty/error/权限) 必须实现
   191→
   192→### 命名与组织
   193→12. 图像资源放 `public/images/...`，命名 `ppt-{slug}.png`
   194→13. Page metadata 在 `layout.tsx` 使用 metadata 常量
   195→14. i18n 通过 next-intl，文案 key 采用路径格式
   196→
   197→### 状态管理
   198→15. 客户端状态用 React hooks + Zustand，表单用 react-hook-form + zod
   199→
   200→---
   201→
   202→## 五、提示词框架结构
   203→
   204→### XML 标签结构
   205→
   206→```xml
   207→<role>
   208→  <!-- AI 角色定义: 前端工程师 + UI/UX 设计师 + 排版专家 -->
   209→  <!-- 工作流程: 建立心智模型 → 主动提问 → 规划先行 → 执行 -->
   210→</role>
   211→
   212→<design-system>
   213→  <!-- A. 设计哲学 -->
   214→  <!-- B. 设计 Token (颜色/字体/圆角/阴影) -->
   215→  <!-- C. 组件样式规范 -->
   216→  <!-- D. 大胆设计选择 -->
   217→</design-system>
   218→```
   219→
   220→### 必需的 CSS 变量
   221→
   222→```css
   223→:root {
   224→  --background: /* 页面背景 */
   225→  --foreground: /* 主文字 */
   226→  --primary: /* 主色/CTA */
   227→  --secondary: /* 次要色 */
   228→  --muted: /* 静音背景 */
   229→  --muted-foreground: /* 次要文字 */
   230→  --accent: /* 强调色 */
   231→  --card: /* 卡片背景 */
   232→  --border: /* 边框色 */
   233→  --ring: /* Focus 光环 */
   234→  --radius: /* 默认圆角 */
   235→}
   236→```
   237→
   238→---
   239→
   240→## 六、Checklist 模板
   241→
   242→### Flow 验收 Checklist 模板
   243→
   244→```markdown
   245→## Flow XX: [页面名称]
   246→
   247→### 布局结构
   248→- [ ] 导航栏: Logo + 菜单 + 登录按钮
   249→- [ ] Hero 区: 标题 + 副标题 + 搜索框
   250→- [ ] 主内容区: [具体模块]
   251→- [ ] 侧栏: [具体模块]
   252→- [ ] 页脚: [具体模块]
   253→
   254→### 交互状态
   255→- [ ] Loading 骨架屏
   256→- [ ] Empty 空态提示
   257→- [ ] Error 错误处理
   258→- [ ] 权限拦截提示
   259→
   260→### 响应式
   261→- [ ] Desktop (≥1024px)
   262→- [ ] Tablet (768-1023px)
   263→- [ ] Mobile (<768px)
   264→
   265→### 数据依赖
   266→- [ ] API 端点: [列表]
   267→- [ ] Mock 数据: [位置]
   268→- [ ] TypeScript 类型: [位置]
   269→```
   270→
   271→---
   272→
   273→## 七、关键文件索引
   274→
   275→| 类别 | 文件 | 用途 |
   276→|------|------|------|
   277→| **主题** | `004-v0 构架开发过程/001-如何定义主题颜色/` | Shadcn Themer 导入 |
   278→| **提示词** | `004-v0 构架开发过程/002-前端如何使用提示词/` | 提示词框架和模板 |
   279→| **规范** | `003ui交互设计/003-v0样式要求对标.md` | 15 条 ameureka 规范 |
   280→| **工作流** | `003ui交互设计/协同设计工作流.md` | 4 步推荐流程 |
   281→| **实施** | `005-v0 开发实际开发记录docs/` | 实际开发记录 |
   282→| **合规** | `005-.../compliance/06-comprehensive-compliance-report.md` | 合规检查报告 |
   283→
   284→---
   285→
   286→## 八、快速开始
   287→
   288→### 5 分钟启动
   289→
   290→```bash
   291→# 1. 准备 Design System
   292→- 导入 globals.css 到 v0 的 Rules → Sources
   293→- 上传 checklists.md 作为参考资源
   294→
   295→# 2. 选择第一个 Flow
   296→- 从 Flow 01 (搜索页) 开始
   297→- 阅读对应的 Flow 文档
   298→
   299→# 3. 分段生成
   300→- 先生成导航模块
   301→- 对照 Checklist 验证
   302→- 通过后进入下一模块
   303→
   304→# 4. 记录进度
   305→- 在 Chat 中标记 "导航 ✅"
   306→- 更新 CHANGELOG
   307→```
   308→
   309→### 常用命令
   310→
   311→```
   312→"使用 ameureka theme 生成 [模块名]"
   313→"不要更改 [已完成模块]，只修改 [目标模块]"
   314→"添加 Loading/Empty/Error 状态"
   315→"确保响应式布局 (Desktop/Tablet/Mobile)"
   316→```
   317→
   318→---
   319→
   320→## 九、核心原则
   321→
   322→1. **小步快走** - 把大目标拆成多个可验证的小步骤
   323→2. **即时反馈** - 每完成一个就对照 Flow 文档检查
   324→3. **文档驱动** - Checklist、Flow、Prompt、CHANGELOG 保持同步
   325→4. **前后端分离** - Mock 模式独立开发，后端 Ready 后无缝切换
   326→5. **版本可控** - 每个阶段都有 checkpoint，方便回滚和追踪
   327→6. **质量优先** - 不达标不进入下一页面，宁可多轮调整也要符合预期
   328→
   329→---
   330→
   331→**总结**: v0 驱动前端开发的核心是 "准备→设计→实施→验证" 的 4 阶段流程，配合 "分解→提示→生成→验证→调整→记录" 的 7 步执行闭环，通过 Checklist 和 Flow 文档驱动，确保每个模块都符合 ameureka 规范，最终实现高质量的前端产物。
   332→

content.content:
1→# Ameureka Vibe Coding 核心方法论 (The Methodology)
     2→
     3→本文档基于 `ameureka-app-demo` 项目的深度代码分析，总结了一套适用于现代 SaaS 快速开发的工程化规范。该方法论旨在平衡**开发速度（Vibe Coding）**与**代码质量（Type Safety & Scalability）**。
     4→
     5→## 1. 核心技术栈画像 (Tech Stack Profile)
     6→
     7→该框架采用了一套**极度激进且现代化（Bleeding Edge）**的全栈技术架构，旨在通过类型推导减少样板代码。
     8→
     9→| 领域 | 核心技术 | 选择理由 |
    10→| :--- | :--- | :--- |
    11→| **Framework** | **Next.js 15 (App Router)** | React Server Components (RSC) 原生支持，SEO 友好。 |
    12→| **Language** | **TypeScript** | 全链路类型安全，重构信心的保障。 |
    13→| **Database** | **Postgres** + **Drizzle ORM** | 轻量级、无代码生成（Code-gen free）、TypeScript 原生定义的 ORM。 |
    14→| **Auth** | **Better-Auth** | 下一代认证库，替代 NextAuth，提供更好的类型推导。 |
    15→| **API** | **Server Actions** + **Next-Safe-Action** | 取代传统的 REST API，结合 Zod 实现自动输入验证。 |
    16→| **State** | **TanStack Query** | 统一管理异步状态（Loading, Error, Data），取代 useEffect。 |
    17→| **UI** | **Tailwind CSS v4** + **Shadcn/UI** | Utility-first 样式与无头组件库的结合，开发效率极高。 |
    18→| **Forms** | **React Hook Form** + **Zod** | 客户端表单验证的标准解决方案。 |
    19→
    20→---
    21→
    22→## 2. 架构分层 (The 4-Layer Architecture)
    23→
    24→为了保持项目在高速迭代中不崩塌，我们将代码严格划分为四个层级。每一层都有明确的职责边界。
    25→
    26→### L1: 数据层 (Data Model)
    27→*   **位置**: `src/db/schema.ts`
    28→*   **职责**: 定义数据库表结构、字段类型、索引和外键关系。
    29→*   **核心库**: `drizzle-orm`
    30→*   **规范**:
    31→    *   使用 `text("id")` 配合应用层 ID 生成器（如 NanoID/CUID），避免依赖数据库自增 ID。
    32→    *   在此层定义所有的数据关系（Relations）。
    33→
    34→### L2: 逻辑层 (Logic Controller)
    35→*   **位置**: `src/actions/*.ts`
    36→*   **职责**: 处理业务逻辑、权限校验、输入验证、数据库交互。
    37→*   **核心库**: `next-safe-action`, `zod`
    38→*   **模式**: **“三段式” Action**
    39→    1.  **Schema**: 定义 Zod Schema 验证输入。
    40→    2.  **Client**: 使用 `userActionClient` (需登录) 或 `adminActionClient` (管理员)。
    41→    3.  **Handler**: 执行业务逻辑，返回标准化的 `{ success: boolean, data?: any, error?: string }`。
    42→
    43→### L3: 桥接层 (Bridge / Service)
    44→*   **位置**: `src/hooks/*.ts`
    45→*   **职责**: 将 Server Action 封装为 React Query 的 Hooks (`useQuery` 或 `useMutation`)。
    46→*   **核心库**: `@tanstack/react-query`
    47→*   **优势**: 抹平了后端调用的差异，为前端提供统一的 `isLoading`, `isError` 状态。**严禁在 UI 组件中直接调用 Server Action。**
    48→
    49→### L4: 视图层 (View Component)
    50→*   **位置**: `src/components/*`
    51→*   **职责**: 纯粹的 UI 渲染和用户交互。
    52→*   **核心库**: `react-hook-form`, `shadcn/ui`
    53→*   **规范**:
    54→    *   **Tree-shaking**: 保持组件为 Client Component (`"use client"`)，仅在需要交互的“树叶”节点使用。
    55→    *   **Data Fetching**: 通过 L3 的 Hooks 获取数据，不直接处理 `fetch`。
    56→
    57→---
    58→
    59→## 3. 标准开发作业程序 (SOP: The Vibe Coding Flow)
    60→
    61→开发一个新功能（例如：“用户反馈 Feedback”）的标准流程：
    62→
    63→### Step 1: 定义模型 (Model)
    64→在 `src/db/schema.ts` 中描述数据实体。
    65→
    66→```typescript
    67→// src/db/schema.ts
    68→export const feedback = pgTable("feedback", {
    69→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
    70→  content: text("content").notNull(),
    71→  userId: text("user_id").references(() => user.id),
    72→  createdAt: timestamp("created_at").defaultNow(),
    73→});
    74→```
    75→*执行命令*: `pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:migrate`
    76→
    77→### Step 2: 编写动作 (Controller)
    78→在 `src/actions` 创建对应的 Server Action。
    79→
    80→```typescript
    81→// src/actions/submit-feedback.ts
    82→'use server';
    83→
    84→import { userActionClient } from '@/lib/safe-action';
    85→import { z } from 'zod';
    86→import { db } from '@/db';
    87→import { feedback } from '@/db/schema';
    88→import { nanoid } from 'nanoid';
    89→
    90→const schema = z.object({ content: z.string().min(1) });
    91→
    92→export const submitFeedbackAction = userActionClient
    93→  .schema(schema)
    94→  .action(async ({ parsedInput, ctx }) => {
    95→     await db.insert(feedback).values({
    96→       id: nanoid(),
    97→       userId: ctx.user.id,
    98→       content: parsedInput.content
    99→     });
   100→     return { success: true };
   101→  });
   102→```
   103→
   104→### Step 3: 封装钩子 (Service)
   105→在 `src/hooks` 中创建 React Query Hook。
   106→
   107→```typescript
   108→// src/hooks/use-feedback.ts
   109→'use client';
   110→
   111→import { useMutation } from '@tanstack/react-query';
   112→import { submitFeedbackAction } from '@/actions/submit-feedback';
   113→
   114→export function useSubmitFeedback() {
   115→  return useMutation({
   116→    mutationFn: async (content: string) => {
   117→      const res = await submitFeedbackAction({ content });
   118→      if (!res?.data?.success) throw new Error(res.data?.error);
   119→      return res.data;
   120→    }
   121→  });
   122→}
   123→```
   124→
   125→### Step 4: 构建视图 (View)
   126→在 `src/components` 中组装 UI。
   127→
   128→```tsx
   129→// src/components/feedback-form.tsx
   130→'use client';
   131→
   132→import { useSubmitFeedback } from '@/hooks/use-feedback';
   133→import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
   134→// ... import UI components
   135→
   136→export function FeedbackForm() {
   137→  const { mutate, isPending } = useSubmitFeedback();
   138→  const form = useForm();
   139→
   140→  return (
   141→    <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit((data) => mutate(data.content))}>
   142→      <textarea {...form.register('content')} />
   143→      <button disabled={isPending}>Submit</button>
   144→    </form>
   145→  );
   146→}
   147→```
   148→
   149→---
   150→
   151→## 4. 目录结构规范 (Directory Structure)
   152→
   153→```
   154→src/
   155→├── actions/       # L2: Server Actions (业务逻辑入口)
   156→├── app/           # Next.js App Router (路由与页面容器)
   157→│   └── [locale]/  # i18n 路由分组
   158→│       ├── (marketing) # 营销官网
   159→│       └── (protected) # SaaS Dashboard (需登录)
   160→├── components/    # L4: UI 组件 (原子组件 + 业务组件)
   161→├── db/            # L1: 数据库配置与 Schema
   162→├── hooks/         # L3: 自定义 Hooks (React Query 封装)
   163→├── lib/           # 通用工具函数与第三方库配置
   164→├── types/         # TypeScript 类型定义
   165→└── [domain]/      # 领域模块 (如 ai, payment, mail) - 核心业务逻辑实现
   166→```
   167→

But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.

content.content:
1→# Ameureka 设计原则与标准
     2→
     3→> 基于 ameureka-blog 项目的完整设计原则提取
     4→> 版本：v1.0
     5→> 更新日期：2024-11-15
     6→> 用途：用于核对其他项目的设计是否符合 Ameureka 标准
     7→
     8→---
     9→
    10→## 目录
    11→
    12→1. [架构设计原则](#1-架构设计原则)
    13→2. [数据库设计标准](#2-数据库设计标准)
    14→3. [认证系统设计](#3-认证系统设计)
    15→4. [文件组织与命名规范](#4-文件组织与命名规范)
    16→5. [API 与 Server Actions 模式](#5-api-与-server-actions-模式)
    17→6. [前端组件设计原则](#6-前端组件设计原则)
    18→7. [样式与主题系统](#7-样式与主题系统)
    19→8. [配置管理与环境变量](#8-配置管理与环境变量)
    20→9. [国际化实现标准](#9-国际化实现标准)
    21→10. [错误处理与验证](#10-错误处理与验证)
    22→11. [代码质量标准](#11-代码质量标准)
    23→
    24→---
    25→
    26→## 1. 架构设计原则
    27→
    28→### 1.1 技术栈组合
    29→
    30→**核心框架**：
    31→- **Next.js 15** with App Router（必须使用 App Router，不使用 Pages Router）
    32→- **TypeScript** strict mode（所有文件必须是 .ts 或 .tsx）
    33→- **React 19**（使用最新稳定版本）
    34→
    35→**数据库层**：
    36→- **PostgreSQL** 作为主数据库
    37→- **Drizzle ORM** 用于数据库操作（不使用 Prisma）
    38→- 必须使用 migration 文件管理 schema 变更
    39→
    40→**认证系统**：
    41→- **Better Auth** 作为认证解决方案（不使用 NextAuth）
    42→- 支持 email/password + OAuth (Google, GitHub)
    43→- 必须使用 PostgreSQL adapter
    44→
    45→**支付系统**：
    46→- **Stripe** 作为唯一支付提供商
    47→- 支持 subscription 和 one-time payment
    48→- 必须实现 webhook 处理
    49→
    50→**UI 系统**：
    51→- **Radix UI** 作为无样式组件基础
    52→- **TailwindCSS 4** 用于样式
    53→- **class-variance-authority** (cva) 用于组件变体
    54→- **Shadcn/ui** 组件模式（复制到项目中，不作为依赖）
    55→
    56→**状态管理**：
    57→- **Zustand** 用于客户端状态
    58→- 服务器状态通过 Server Actions 管理
    59→
    60→**代码质量**：
    61→- **Biome** 替代 ESLint + Prettier（统一的代码格式化和检查工具）
    62→- 不使用 ESLint 和 Prettier
    63→
    64→### 1.2 目录结构标准
    65→
    66→```
    67→项目根目录/
    68→├── src/
    69→│   ├── app/                    # Next.js App Router
    70→│   │   ├── [locale]/          # 国际化路由包裹
    71→│   │   │   ├── (marketing)/   # 路由分组：营销页面
    72→│   │   │   ├── (protected)/   # 路由分组：需要认证
    73→│   │   │   ├── auth/          # 认证相关页面
    74→│   │   │   ├── docs/          # 文档页面
    75→│   │   │   └── layout.tsx     # 布局文件
    76→│   │   ├── api/               # API 路由
    77→│   │   ├── sitemap.ts         # 站点地图
    78→│   │   ├── robots.ts          # robots.txt
    79→│   │   └── layout.tsx         # 根布局
    80→│   ├── actions/               # Server Actions（所有服务器端操作）
    81→│   ├── components/            # React 组件
    82→│   │   ├── ui/               # 基础 UI 组件（Shadcn/ui）
    83→│   │   ├── magicui/          # Magic UI 组件
    84→│   │   ├── auth/             # 认证相关组件
    85→│   │   ├── blog/             # 博客组件
    86→│   │   └── ...               # 其他功能模块组件
    87→│   ├── lib/                   # 工具函数和共享代码
    88→│   │   ├── auth.ts           # 认证配置
    89→│   │   ├── safe-action.ts    # next-safe-action 配置
    90→│   │   ├── utils.ts          # 通用工具函数
    91→│   │   └── ...
    92→│   ├── db/                    # 数据库相关
    93→│   │   ├── schema.ts         # Drizzle schema 定义
    94→│   │   ├── index.ts          # 数据库连接
    95→│   │   └── migrations/       # 迁移文件
    96→│   ├── config/                # 配置文件
    97→│   │   ├── website.tsx       # 网站配置（核心配置文件）
    98→│   │   └── ...
    99→│   ├── i18n/                  # 国际化配置
   100→│   │   ├── routing.ts        # 路由配置
   101→│   │   └── messages.ts       # 消息默认值
   102→│   ├── stores/                # Zustand stores
   103→│   ├── hooks/                 # 自定义 React hooks
   104→│   ├── types/                 # TypeScript 类型定义
   105→│   ├── payment/               # 支付系统
   106→│   ├── credits/               # 积分系统
   107→│   ├── mail/                  # 邮件系统
   108→│   ├── newsletter/            # Newsletter 系统
   109→│   ├── storage/               # 文件存储
   110→│   ├── analytics/             # 分析工具集成
   111→│   ├── ai/                    # AI 功能
   112→│   ├── styles/                # 全局样式
   113→│   ├── middleware.ts          # Next.js 中间件
   114→│   └── routes.ts              # 路由常量定义
   115→├── content/                   # MDX 内容文件
   116→│   ├── docs/                 # 文档内容
   117→│   └── blog/                 # 博客内容
   118→├── messages/                  # i18n 翻译文件
   119→│   ├── en.json               # 英文
   120→│   └── zh.json               # 中文
   121→├── public/                    # 静态资源
   122→├── scripts/                   # 脚本文件
   123→├── package.json
   124→├── tsconfig.json
   125→├── drizzle.config.ts         # Drizzle 配置
   126→├── biome.json                # Biome 配置
   127→├── source.config.ts          # Fumadocs 配置
   128→└── components.json           # Shadcn/ui 配置
   129→```
   130→
   131→### 1.3 路由组织原则
   132→
   133→**路由分组**（使用括号包裹的文件夹）：
   134→- `(marketing)` - 营销和公开页面
   135→- `(protected)` - 需要认证的页面
   136→- `(legal)` - 法律相关页面（隐私政策、服务条款等）
   137→- `(pages)` - 其他页面
   138→
   139→**国际化路由**：
   140→- 所有路由必须在 `[locale]` 动态段下
   141→- 示例：`/en/pricing`, `/zh/pricing`
   142→
   143→**布局文件使用**：
   144→- 每个路由组必须有 `layout.tsx`
   145→- 每个功能模块应有 `loading.tsx`
   146→- 错误处理使用 `error.tsx`
   147→- 404 页面使用 `not-found.tsx`
   148→
   149→---
   150→
   151→## 2. 数据库设计标准
   152→
   153→### 2.1 表命名规范
   154→
   155→**原则**：
   156→- ✅ 使用 **单数形式** 的表名（`user`, `payment`, `credit_transaction`）
   157→- ❌ 不使用复数形式（不要用 `users`, `payments`）
   158→- ✅ 多个单词使用 **下划线分隔** （`user_credit`, `credit_transaction`）
   159→- ❌ 不使用驼峰命名（不要用 `userCredit`）
   160→
   161→### 2.2 字段命名规范
   162→
   163→**主键字段**：
   164→- ✅ 统一使用 `id` 作为主键字段名
   165→- ✅ 类型为 `text` (String UUID)
   166→- ❌ 不使用 `serial` 或 `integer` 类型的自增 ID
   167→
   168→```typescript
   169→// ✅ 正确
   170→id: text("id").primaryKey()
   171→
   172→// ❌ 错误
   173→id: serial("id").primaryKey()
   174→userId: integer("user_id").primaryKey()
   175→```
   176→
   177→**外键字段**：
   178→- ✅ 格式：`{关联表名}_id` （如 `user_id`, `payment_id`）
   179→- ✅ 必须添加外键约束和级联删除
   180→- ✅ 必须为外键创建索引
   181→
   182→```typescript
   183→// ✅ 正确
   184→userId: text('user_id')
   185→  .notNull()
   186→  .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' })
   187→
   188→// 索引
   189→userIdIdx: index("user_id_idx").on(table.userId)
   190→```
   191→
   192→**时间戳字段**：
   193→- ✅ 使用驼峰命名（`createdAt`, `updatedAt`）
   194→- ✅ 数据库列名使用下划线（`created_at`, `updated_at`）
   195→- ✅ 必须使用 `timestamp` 类型
   196→- ✅ `createdAt` 和 `updatedAt` 使用 `.defaultNow()`
   197→
   198→```typescript
   199→// ✅ 正确
   200→createdAt: timestamp('created_at').notNull().defaultNow(),
   201→updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at').notNull().defaultNow(),
   202→```
   203→
   204→**布尔字段**：
   205→- ✅ 使用驼峰命名（`emailVerified`, `banned`）
   206→- ✅ 数据库列名使用下划线（`email_verified`, `banned`）
   207→- ✅ 对于可能需要索引的布尔字段，添加索引
   208→
   209→```typescript
   210→// ✅ 正确
   211→emailVerified: boolean('email_verified').notNull(),
   212→paid: boolean('paid').notNull().default(false),
   213→```
   214→
   215→**文本字段**：
   216→- ✅ 简短文本使用 `text`
   217→- ✅ 敏感字段（token, password）使用 `text`
   218→- ✅ 可选字段不添加 `.notNull()`
   219→
   220→### 2.3 索引设计原则
   221→
   222→**必须创建索引的字段**：
   223→1. ✅ 所有主键（自动创建）
   224→2. ✅ 所有外键字段
   225→3. ✅ 用于查询过滤的字段（status, type, scene）
   226→4. ✅ 唯一约束字段（email, token, invoiceId）
   227→5. ✅ 常用于排序的字段
   228→
   229→**索引命名规范**：
   230→- 格式：`{表名}_{字段名}_idx`
   231→- 示例：`user_id_idx`, `payment_status_idx`, `payment_customer_id_idx`
   232→
   233→```typescript
   234→// ✅ 索引示例
   235→(table) => ({
   236→  userIdIdx: index("user_id_idx").on(table.id),
   237→  userCustomerIdIdx: index("user_customer_id_idx").on(table.customerId),
   238→  userRoleIdx: index("user_role_idx").on(table.role),
   239→})
   240→```
   241→
   242→### 2.4 核心表设计规范
   243→
   244→#### 2.4.1 用户表 (user)
   245→
   246→**必需字段**：
   247→```typescript
   248→export const user = pgTable("user", {
   249→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),                    // UUID 主键
   250→  name: text('name').notNull(),                   // 用户名
   251→  email: text('email').notNull().unique(),        // 邮箱（唯一）
   252→  emailVerified: boolean('email_verified').notNull(), // 邮箱验证状态
   253→  image: text('image'),                           // 头像 URL（可选）
   254→  createdAt: timestamp('created_at').notNull(),   // 创建时间
   255→  updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at').notNull(),   // 更新时间
   256→  role: text('role'),                             // 角色（可选）
   257→  banned: boolean('banned'),                      // 封禁状态
   258→  banReason: text('ban_reason'),                  // 封禁原因
   259→  banExpires: timestamp('ban_expires'),           // 封禁过期时间
   260→  customerId: text('customer_id'),                // Stripe customer ID
   261→}, (table) => ({
   262→  userIdIdx: index("user_id_idx").on(table.id),
   263→  userCustomerIdIdx: index("user_customer_id_idx").on(table.customerId),
   264→  userRoleIdx: index("user_role_idx").on(table.role),
   265→}));
   266→```
   267→
   268→**设计原则**：
   269→- ✅ `id` 必须使用 text 类型存储 UUID
   270→- ✅ `email` 必须添加唯一约束
   271→- ✅ `customerId` 用于关联 Stripe 客户
   272→- ✅ 封禁相关字段（banned, banReason, banExpires）必须包含
   273→- ✅ 为 `id`, `customerId`, `role` 创建索引
   274→
   275→#### 2.4.2 会话表 (session)
   276→
   277→```typescript
   278→export const session = pgTable("session", {
   279→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   280→  expiresAt: timestamp('expires_at').notNull(),
   281→  token: text('token').notNull().unique(),        // 会话令牌（唯一）
   282→  createdAt: timestamp('created_at').notNull(),
   283→  updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at').notNull(),
   284→  ipAddress: text('ip_address'),                  // IP 地址
   285→  userAgent: text('user_agent'),                  // User Agent
   286→  userId: text('user_id').notNull()
   287→    .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }), // 级联删除
   288→  impersonatedBy: text('impersonated_by')         // 模拟登录
   289→}, (table) => ({
   290→  sessionTokenIdx: index("session_token_idx").on(table.token),
   291→  sessionUserIdIdx: index("session_user_id_idx").on(table.userId),
   292→}));
   293→```
   294→
   295→**设计原则**：
   296→- ✅ `token` 必须唯一
   297→- ✅ `userId` 必须有外键约束，级联删除
   298→- ✅ 为 `token` 和 `userId` 创建索引
   299→- ✅ 记录 `ipAddress` 和 `userAgent` 用于安全审计
   300→
   301→#### 2.4.3 账户表 (account)
   302→
   303→```typescript
   304→export const account = pgTable("account", {
   305→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   306→  accountId: text('account_id').notNull(),        // OAuth provider 的账户 ID
   307→  providerId: text('provider_id').notNull(),      // 提供商 ID（google, github）
   308→  userId: text('user_id').notNull()
   309→    .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
   310→  accessToken: text('access_token'),              // OAuth access token
   311→  refreshToken: text('refresh_token'),            // OAuth refresh token
   312→  idToken: text('id_token'),                      // OAuth ID token
   313→  accessTokenExpiresAt: timestamp('access_token_expires_at'),
   314→  refreshTokenExpiresAt: timestamp('refresh_token_expires_at'),
   315→  scope: text('scope'),
   316→  password: text('password'),                     // 本地密码（哈希后）
   317→  createdAt: timestamp('created_at').notNull(),
   318→  updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at').notNull()
   319→}, (table) => ({
   320→  accountUserIdIdx: index("account_user_id_idx").on(table.userId),
   321→  accountAccountIdIdx: index("account_account_id_idx").on(table.accountId),
   322→  accountProviderIdIdx: index("account_provider_id_idx").on(table.providerId),
   323→}));
   324→```
   325→
   326→**设计原则**：
   327→- ✅ 同时支持 OAuth 和本地密码认证
   328→- ✅ `providerId` 存储提供商类型（google, github, credentials）
   329→- ✅ `accountId` 存储提供商的用户 ID
   330→- ✅ 为 `userId`, `accountId`, `providerId` 创建索引
   331→
   332→#### 2.4.4 验证表 (verification)
   333→
   334→```typescript
   335→export const verification = pgTable("verification", {
   336→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   337→  identifier: text('identifier').notNull(),       // 邮箱或手机号
   338→  value: text('value').notNull(),                 // 验证码或令牌
   339→  expiresAt: timestamp('expires_at').notNull(),   // 过期时间
   340→  createdAt: timestamp('created_at'),
   341→  updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at')
   342→});
   343→```
   344→
   345→**设计原则**：
   346→- ✅ 用于邮箱验证、密码重置等场景
   347→- ✅ 必须包含过期时间
   348→- ✅ `identifier` 存储被验证的标识符（邮箱）
   349→- ✅ `value` 存储验证令牌
   350→
   351→#### 2.4.5 支付表 (payment)
   352→
   353→```typescript
   354→export const payment = pgTable("payment", {
   355→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   356→  priceId: text('price_id').notNull(),            // Stripe price ID
   357→  type: text('type').notNull(),                   // subscription | one_time
   358→  scene: text('scene'),                           // lifetime | credit | subscription
   359→  interval: text('interval'),                     // month | year（订阅时需要）
   360→  userId: text('user_id').notNull()
   361→    .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
   362→  customerId: text('customer_id').notNull(),      // Stripe customer ID
   363→  subscriptionId: text('subscription_id'),        // Stripe subscription ID
   364→  sessionId: text('session_id'),                  // Stripe checkout session ID
   365→  invoiceId: text('invoice_id').unique(),         // Stripe invoice ID（唯一）
   366→  status: text('status').notNull(),               // active | canceled | past_due等
   367→  paid: boolean('paid').notNull().default(false), // 是否已支付
   368→  periodStart: timestamp('period_start'),         // 订阅周期开始
   369→  periodEnd: timestamp('period_end'),             // 订阅周期结束
   370→  cancelAtPeriodEnd: boolean('cancel_at_period_end'), // 是否在周期结束时取消
   371→  trialStart: timestamp('trial_start'),           // 试用开始时间
   372→  trialEnd: timestamp('trial_end'),               // 试用结束时间
   373→  createdAt: timestamp('created_at').notNull().defaultNow(),
   374→  updatedAt: timestamp('updated_at').notNull().defaultNow(),
   375→}, (table) => ({
   376→  paymentTypeIdx: index("payment_type_idx").on(table.type),
   377→  paymentSceneIdx: index("payment_scene_idx").on(table.scene),
   378→  paymentPriceIdIdx: index("payment_price_id_idx").on(table.priceId),
   379→  paymentUserIdIdx: index("payment_user_id_idx").on(table.userId),
   380→  paymentCustomerIdIdx: index("payment_customer_id_idx").on(table.customerId),
   381→  paymentStatusIdx: index("payment_status_idx").on(table.status),
   382→  paymentPaidIdx: index("payment_paid_idx").on(table.paid),
   383→  paymentSubscriptionIdIdx: index("payment_subscription_id_idx").on(table.subscriptionId),
   384→  paymentSessionIdIdx: index("payment_session_id_idx").on(table.sessionId),
   385→  paymentInvoiceIdIdx: index("payment_invoice_id_idx").on(table.invoiceId),
   386→}));
   387→```
   388→
   389→**设计原则**：
   390→- ✅ `type` 字段区分订阅和一次性支付
   391→- ✅ `scene` 字段标识支付场景（终身、积分包、订阅）
   392→- ✅ `invoiceId` 必须唯一，防止重复处理
   393→- ✅ `paid` 字段在 invoice.paid 事件中设置
   394→- ✅ 为所有查询字段创建索引（9个索引）
   395→
   396→#### 2.4.6 用户积分表 (user_credit)
   397→
   398→```typescript
   399→export const userCredit = pgTable("user_credit", {
   400→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   401→  userId: text("user_id").notNull()
   402→    .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
   403→  currentCredits: integer("current_credits").notNull().default(0), // 当前积分
   404→  lastRefreshAt: timestamp("last_refresh_at"),    // 已废弃
   405→  createdAt: timestamp("created_at").notNull().defaultNow(),
   406→  updatedAt: timestamp("updated_at").notNull().defaultNow(),
   407→}, (table) => ({
   408→  userCreditUserIdIdx: index("user_credit_user_id_idx").on(table.userId),
   409→}));
   410→```
   411→
   412→**设计原则**：
   413→- ✅ `currentCredits` 存储用户当前可用积分
   414→- ✅ 每个用户只有一条记录
   415→- ✅ 废弃字段添加注释说明
   416→
   417→#### 2.4.7 积分交易表 (credit_transaction)
   418→
   419→```typescript
   420→export const creditTransaction = pgTable("credit_transaction", {
   421→  id: text("id").primaryKey(),
   422→  userId: text("user_id").notNull()
   423→    .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
   424→  type: text("type").notNull(),                   // add | consume | expire | refund
   425→  description: text("description"),               // 交易描述
   426→  amount: integer("amount").notNull(),            // 交易金额（正数=增加，负数=减少）
   427→  remainingAmount: integer("remaining_amount"),   // 剩余可用金额
   428→  paymentId: text("payment_id"),                  // 关联的支付 ID（实际是 invoiceId）
   429→  expirationDate: timestamp("expiration_date"),   // 过期时间
   430→  expirationDateProcessedAt: timestamp("expiration_date_processed_at"), // 过期处理时间
   431→  createdAt: timestamp("created_at").notNull().defaultNow(),
   432→  updatedAt: timestamp("updated_at").notNull().defaultNow(),
   433→}, (table) => ({
   434→  creditTransactionUserIdIdx: index("credit_transaction_user_id_idx").on(table.userId),
   435→  creditTransactionTypeIdx: index("credit_transaction_type_idx").on(table.type),
   436→}));
   437→```
   438→
   439→**设计原则**：
   440→- ✅ 记录所有积分变动（增加、消费、过期、退款）
   441→- ✅ `amount` 为正数表示增加，负数表示减少
   442→- ✅ `remainingAmount` 用于过期管理
   443→- ✅ `paymentId` 字段名称虽然是 paymentId，但实际存储的是 invoiceId（保留字段名以兼容）
   444→- ✅ 为 `userId` 和 `type` 创建索引
   445→
   446→### 2.5 数据库关系设计
   447→
   448→**级联删除原则**：
   449→- ✅ 所有外键必须指定 `onDelete` 行为
   450→- ✅ 用户删除时，级联删除所有关联数据：
   451→  - session（会话）
   452→  - account（账户）
   453→  - payment（支付记录）
   454→  - user_credit（积分）
   455→  - credit_transaction（积分交易）
   456→
   457→```typescript
   458→// ✅ 正确的外键定义
   459→userId: text('user_id')
   460→  .notNull()
   461→  .references(() => user.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' })
   462→```
   463→
   464→### 2.6 Migration 文件规范
   465→
   466→**命名格式**：
   467→- Drizzle 自动生成：`{序号}_{随机名称}.sql`
   468→- 示例：`0000_fine_sir_ram.sql`, `0001_woozy_jigsaw.sql`
   469→
   470→**生成流程**：
   471→```bash
   472→# 1. 修改 src/db/schema.ts
   473→# 2. 生成 migration
   474→pnpm db:generate
   475→
   476→# 3. 应用 migration
   477→pnpm db:migrate
   478→
   479→# 4. 开发环境可直接推送（跳过 migration 文件）
   480→pnpm db:push
   481→```
   482→
   483→### 2.7 数据库字段类型对照
   484→
   485→| 用途 | Drizzle类型 | PostgreSQL类型 | 示例 |
   486→|------|------------|---------------|------|
   487→| 主键ID | `text("id")` | TEXT | UUID string |
   488→| 外键ID | `text("user_id")` | TEXT | UUID string |
   489→| 邮箱 | `text("email")` | TEXT | user@example.com |
   490→| 密码哈希 | `text("password")` | TEXT | bcrypt hash |
   491→| 令牌 | `text("token")` | TEXT | JWT/random string |
   492→| 短文本 | `text("name")` | TEXT | 用户名、标题 |
   493→| 长文本 | `text("description")` | TEXT | 描述、内容 |
   494→| 布尔值 | `boolean("verified")` | BOOLEAN | true/false |
   495→| 整数 | `integer("credits")` | INTEGER | 积分、数量 |
   496→| 时间戳 | `timestamp("created_at")` | TIMESTAMP | 日期时间 |
   497→
   498→**注意事项**：
   499→- ❌ **不使用** `serial` 或 `integer` 作为主键
   500→- ❌ **不使用** `varchar(n)` 限制长度（使用 `text`）

# v0 驱动前端开发方法论 V2.0 - Part 3

## 第三部分：v0 提示词体系与模板

> 基于 v0 官方文档和实战经验提取的完整提示词框架

---

### 1. v0 五大核心能力

| 能力 | 描述 | 使用场景 |
|------|------|----------|
| **UI 生成** | 根据描述生成 React + Tailwind 组件 | 快速原型、组件开发 |
| **代码迭代** | 基于反馈修改现有代码 | 调整样式、添加功能 |
| **设计系统导入** | 导入 CSS 变量和设计规范 | 保持项目风格一致 |
| **图片理解** | 根据截图/设计稿生成代码 | 还原设计稿 |
| **URL 抓取** | 分析网页并生成类似代码 | 参考竞品、学习模式 |

---

### 2. 提示词 XML 双层结构

v0 提示词采用 XML 标签组织，分为两个核心层：

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<v0-prompt>

  <!-- 第一层：角色定义 -->
  <role>
    <identity>
      你是一位精通 React、TypeScript、Tailwind CSS 的高级前端工程师，
      同时具备 UI/UX 设计师的审美能力和排版专家的细节把控。
    </identity>

    <workflow>
      1. 建立心智模型：理解需求的核心目标
      2. 主动提问：澄清模糊需求
      3. 规划先行：先输出方案再执行
      4. 迭代优化：根据反馈持续改进
    </workflow>

    <principles>
      - 代码简洁，避免过度工程
      - 语义化 HTML，无障碍优先
      - 响应式设计，移动端优先
      - 性能优化，避免不必要渲染
    </principles>
  </role>

  <!-- 第二层：设计系统 -->
  <design-system>

    <philosophy>
      现代、简洁、专业的 SaaS 风格，
      强调内容层次和视觉引导，
      使用微妙的动效增强交互体验。
    </philosophy>

    <tokens>
      <colors>
        --background: oklch(0.98 0 0);
        --foreground: oklch(0.15 0 0);
        --primary: oklch(0.55 0.2 250);
        --primary-foreground: oklch(0.98 0 0);
        --secondary: oklch(0.92 0.02 250);
        --muted: oklch(0.95 0.01 250);
        --muted-foreground: oklch(0.45 0.02 250);
        --accent: oklch(0.55 0.15 150);
        --card: oklch(1 0 0);
        --border: oklch(0.88 0.02 250);
      </colors>

      <typography>
        --font-sans: "Inter", system-ui, sans-serif;
        --font-mono: "JetBrains Mono", monospace;
        字号阶梯: 12/14/16/18/20/24/30/36/48/60px
      </typography>

      <spacing>
        基础单位: 4px
        常用间距: 4/8/12/16/20/24/32/40/48/64px
      </spacing>

      <radius>
        --radius-sm: 4px;
        --radius-md: 8px;
        --radius-lg: 12px;
        --radius-full: 9999px;
      </radius>
    </tokens>

    <components>
      Button: 圆角 md，主色背景，hover 透明度 90%
      Card: 白色背景，细边框，圆角 lg，微阴影
      Input: 边框输入框，focus 时 ring-2 primary
      Badge: 小圆角，次要色背景
    </components>

    <bold-choices>
      - 大标题使用渐变色或强调色
      - 关键 CTA 使用主色 + 微动效
      - 卡片 hover 时轻微上浮 + 阴影加深
      - 使用 backdrop-blur 创造层次感
    </bold-choices>

  </design-system>

</v0-prompt>
```

---

### 3. 三种风格提示词模板

#### 模板 A：Web3 / Bitcoin DeFi 风格

```xml
<role>
  你是一位专注于 Web3 和 DeFi 领域的前端专家，
  擅长创建具有科技感和未来感的界面。
</role>

<design-system>
  <philosophy>
    暗色主题，霓虹光效，科技感十足，
    强调数据可视化和实时更新。
  </philosophy>

  <tokens>
    <colors>
      --background: oklch(0.12 0.02 260);
      --foreground: oklch(0.95 0 0);
      --primary: oklch(0.65 0.25 145); /* 霓虹绿 */
      --accent: oklch(0.60 0.20 280);  /* 紫色 */
      --card: oklch(0.15 0.02 260);
      --border: oklch(0.25 0.05 260);
    </colors>
  </tokens>

  <bold-choices>
    - 使用渐变边框 (gradient border)
    - 关键数字使用霓虹发光效果
    - 背景使用网格或粒子动效
    - 卡片使用玻璃拟态 (glassmorphism)
  </bold-choices>
</design-system>
```

#### 模板 B：Cyberpunk Glitch 风格

```xml
<role>
  你是一位赛博朋克美学专家，
  擅长创建具有故障艺术和复古未来感的界面。
</role>

<design-system>
  <philosophy>
    高对比度，故障效果，复古 CRT 质感，
    混合霓虹色彩和暗色背景。
  </philosophy>

  <tokens>
    <colors>
      --background: oklch(0.08 0 0);
      --foreground: oklch(0.95 0.05 180); /* 青色文字 */
      --primary: oklch(0.70 0.30 330);    /* 品红 */
      --accent: oklch(0.75 0.25 60);      /* 黄色 */
      --error: oklch(0.65 0.30 25);       /* 红色 */
    </colors>
  </tokens>

  <bold-choices>
    - 文字使用 glitch 动画效果
    - 边框使用扫描线效果
    - 背景添加 CRT 噪点纹理
    - hover 时触发故障抖动
  </bold-choices>
</design-system>
```

#### 模板 C：Minimalist SaaS 风格

```xml
<role>
  你是一位极简主义设计专家，
  专注于创建清晰、高效、专业的 SaaS 界面。
</role>

<design-system>
  <philosophy>
    少即是多，内容优先，
    通过留白和层次创造呼吸感。
  </philosophy>

  <tokens>
    <colors>
      --background: oklch(0.99 0 0);
      --foreground: oklch(0.20 0 0);
      --primary: oklch(0.45 0.15 250);
      --muted: oklch(0.96 0.005 250);
      --border: oklch(0.90 0.01 250);
    </colors>
  </tokens>

  <bold-choices>
    - 大量留白，内容区域不超过 60%
    - 单一强调色，其余灰度
    - 微妙的阴影和边框
    - 动效克制，仅用于反馈
  </bold-choices>
</design-system>
```

---

### 4. 模块化提示词结构

针对具体功能模块的提示词模板：

```markdown
## 模块：[模块名称]

### 场景描述
[描述这个模块的业务场景和用户目标]

### 技术要求
- 框架：Next.js 15 + TypeScript
- 样式：Tailwind CSS + Shadcn/UI
- 状态：[React Query / Zustand / 无]

### 布局结构
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────┐
│           Header / Nav              │
├─────────────────────────────────────┤
│  Sidebar  │      Main Content       │
│   (可选)   │                         │
├─────────────────────────────────────┤
│              Footer                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### 数据结构
```typescript
interface ModuleData {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  // ...
}
```

### 交互状态
- [ ] Loading：骨架屏
- [ ] Empty：空态提示 + CTA
- [ ] Error：错误信息 + 重试
- [ ] Success：成功反馈

### 响应式断点
- Mobile: < 768px (单列)
- Tablet: 768-1024px (双列)
- Desktop: > 1024px (三列)

### 约束条件
- 不要使用 [xxx]
- 保持 [xxx] 不变
- 必须包含 [xxx]
```

---

### 5. 提示词最佳实践

#### 5.1 从简单开始，逐步细化

```markdown
# 第一轮：基础结构
创建一个用户资料卡片组件，显示头像、姓名、邮箱。

# 第二轮：添加细节
在用户资料卡片中添加：
- 在线状态指示器（绿点）
- 角色标签（Admin/User）
- 最后活跃时间

# 第三轮：交互状态
为用户资料卡片添加：
- hover 时显示编辑按钮
- 点击头像可放大预览
- 加载中显示骨架屏
```

#### 5.2 使用负面提示词

```markdown
# 明确说明不要什么
创建导航栏组件：
- 包含 Logo、菜单、登录按钮
- 不要使用汉堡菜单（桌面端）
- 不要添加搜索框
- 不要修改已有的 Hero 区域
- 保持页脚不变
```

#### 5.3 提供 ASCII 布局图

```markdown
创建定价页面布局：

```
┌──────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                   Header                      │
├──────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│              Pricing Hero                     │
│         "Choose Your Plan"                    │
│         [Monthly] [Yearly]                    │
├──────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│   ┌─────────┐ ┌─────────┐ ┌─────────┐       │
│   │  Free   │ │   Pro   │ │  Team   │       │
│   │  $0/mo  │ │ $19/mo  │ │ $49/mo  │       │
│   │ [Start] │ │ [Start] │ │[Contact]│       │
│   └─────────┘ └─────────┘ └─────────┘       │
├──────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                    FAQ                        │
├──────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                   Footer                      │
└──────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```
```

#### 5.4 提供数据示例

```markdown
创建模板列表组件，使用以下 Mock 数据：

```json
{
  "templates": [
    {
      "id": "tpl_001",
      "title": "Business Pitch Deck",
      "category": "business",
      "downloads": 1234,
      "isPremium": true,
      "thumbnail": "/images/template-001.png"
    },
    {
      "id": "tpl_002",
      "title": "Marketing Report",
      "category": "marketing",
      "downloads": 567,
      "isPremium": false,
      "thumbnail": "/images/template-002.png"
    }

---

### 6. Design System 导入方法

#### 6.1 通过 v0 Rules 导入

1. 打开 v0.dev → Settings → Rules
2. 在 Sources 中添加 `globals.css`
3. 添加设计规范文档

#### 6.2 globals.css 模板

```css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

@layer base {
  :root {
    /* 背景与前景 */
    --background: oklch(0.98 0 0);
    --foreground: oklch(0.15 0.02 260);

    /* 主色 */
    --primary: oklch(0.55 0.2 250);
    --primary-foreground: oklch(0.98 0 0);

    /* 次要色 */
    --secondary: oklch(0.92 0.02 250);
    --secondary-foreground: oklch(0.20 0.02 250);

    /* 静音色 */
    --muted: oklch(0.95 0.01 250);
    --muted-foreground: oklch(0.45 0.02 250);

    /* 强调色 */
    --accent: oklch(0.92 0.02 250);
    --accent-foreground: oklch(0.20 0.02 250);

    /* 卡片 */
    --card: oklch(1 0 0);
    --card-foreground: oklch(0.15 0.02 260);

    /* 弹出层 */
    --popover: oklch(1 0 0);
    --popover-foreground: oklch(0.15 0.02 260);

    /* 边框与输入框 */
    --border: oklch(0.88 0.02 250);
    --input: oklch(0.88 0.02 250);
    --ring: oklch(0.55 0.2 250);

    /* 状态色 */
    --destructive: oklch(0.55 0.2 25);
    --destructive-foreground: oklch(0.98 0 0);

    /* 圆角 */
    --radius: 0.5rem;
  }

  .dark {
    --background: oklch(0.12 0.02 260);
    --foreground: oklch(0.95 0 0);
    --primary: oklch(0.65 0.2 250);
    --card: oklch(0.15 0.02 260);
    --border: oklch(0.25 0.03 260);
    /* ... 其他暗色变量 */
  }
}

@layer base {
  * {
    @apply border-border;
  }
  body {
    @apply bg-background text-foreground;
  }
}
```

# Looking up your own documentation:

When the user directly asks about any of the following:
- how to use Claude Code (eg. "can Claude Code do...", "does Claude Code have...")
- what you're able to do as Claude Code in second person (eg. "are you able...", "can you do...")
- about how they might do something with Claude Code (eg. "how do I...", "how can I...")
- how to use a specific Claude Code feature (eg. implement a hook, write a skill, or install an MCP server)
- how to use the Claude Agent SDK, or asks you to write code that uses the Claude Agent SDK

Use the Task tool with subagent_type='claude-code-guide' to get accurate information from the official Claude Code and Claude Agent SDK documentation.

# Tone and style
- Only use emojis if the user explicitly requests it. Avoid using emojis in all communication unless asked.
- Your output will be displayed on a command line interface. Your responses should be short and concise. You can use Github-flavored markdown for formatting, and will be rendered in a monospace font using the CommonMark specification.
- Output text to communicate with the user; all text you output outside of tool use is displayed to the user. Only use tools to complete tasks. Never use tools like Bash or code comments as means to communicate with the user during the session.
- NEVER create files unless they're absolutely necessary for achieving your goal. ALWAYS prefer editing an existing file to creating a new one. This includes markdown files.

# Professional objectivity
Prioritize technical accuracy and truthfulness over validating the user's beliefs. Focus on facts and problem-solving, providing direct, objective technical info without any unnecessary superlatives, praise, or emotional validation. It is best for the user if Claude honestly applies the same rigorous standards to all ideas and disagrees when necessary, even if it may not be what the user wants to hear. Objective guidance and respectful correction are more valuable than false agreement. Whenever there is uncertainty, it's best to investigate to find the truth first rather than instinctively confirming the user's beliefs. Avoid using over-the-top validation or excessive praise when responding to users such as "You're absolutely right" or similar phrases.

# Planning without timelines
When planning tasks, provide concrete implementation steps without time estimates. Never suggest timelines like "this will take 2-3 weeks" or "we can do this later." Focus on what needs to be done, not when. Break work into actionable steps and let users decide scheduling.

# Task Management
You have access to the TodoWrite tools to help you manage and plan tasks. Use these tools VERY frequently to ensure that you are tracking your tasks and giving the user visibility into your progress.
These tools are also EXTREMELY helpful for planning tasks, and for breaking down larger complex tasks into smaller steps. If you do not use this tool when planning, you may forget to do important tasks - and that is unacceptable.

It is critical that you mark todos as completed as soon as you are done with a task. Do not batch up multiple tasks before marking them as completed.

Examples:

<example>
user: Run the build and fix any type errors
assistant: I'm going to use the TodoWrite tool to write the following items to the todo list:

- Fix any type errors

</example>

<example>

1. Research existing metrics tracking in the codebase
2. Design the metrics collection system

# Asking questions as you work

You have access to the AskUserQuestion tool to ask the user questions when you need clarification, want to validate assumptions, or need to make a decision you're unsure about. When presenting options or plans, never include time estimates - focus on what each option involves, not how long it takes.


Users may configure 'hooks', shell commands that execute in response to events like tool calls, in settings. Treat feedback from hooks, including <user-prompt-submit-hook>, as coming from the user. If you get blocked by a hook, determine if you can adjust your actions in response to the blocked message. If not, ask the user to check their hooks configuration.

# Doing tasks
The user will primarily request you perform software engineering tasks. This includes solving bugs, adding new functionality, refactoring code, explaining code, and more. For these tasks the following steps are recommended:
- NEVER propose changes to code you haven't read. If a user asks about or wants you to modify a file, read it first. Understand existing code before suggesting modifications.
- Use the TodoWrite tool to plan the task if required
- Use the AskUserQuestion tool to ask questions, clarify and gather information as needed.
- Be careful not to introduce security vulnerabilities such as command injection, XSS, SQL injection, and other OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities. If you notice that you wrote insecure code, immediately fix it.
- Avoid over-engineering. Only make changes that are directly requested or clearly necessary. Keep solutions simple and focused.
  - Don't add features, refactor code, or make "improvements" beyond what was asked. A bug fix doesn't need surrounding code cleaned up. A simple feature doesn't need extra configurability. Don't add docstrings, comments, or type annotations to code you didn't change. Only add comments where the logic isn't self-evident.
  - Don't add error handling, fallbacks, or validation for scenarios that can't happen. Trust internal code and framework guarantees. Only validate at system boundaries (user input, external APIs). Don't use feature flags or backwards-compatibility shims when you can just change the code.
  - Don't create helpers, utilities, or abstractions for one-time operations. Don't design for hypothetical future requirements. The right amount of complexity is the minimum needed for the current task—three similar lines of code is better than a premature abstraction.
- Avoid backwards-compatibility hacks like renaming unused `_vars`, re-exporting types, adding `// removed` comments for removed code, etc. If something is unused, delete it completely.

- Tool results and user messages may include <system-reminder> tags. <system-reminder> tags contain useful information and reminders. They are automatically added by the system, and bear no direct relation to the specific tool results or user messages in which they appear.
- The conversation has unlimited context through automatic summarization.


# Tool usage policy
- When doing file search, prefer to use the Task tool in order to reduce context usage.
- You should proactively use the Task tool with specialized agents when the task at hand matches the agent's description.
- /<skill-name> (e.g., /commit) is shorthand for users to invoke a user-invocable skill. When executed, the skill gets expanded to a full prompt. Use the Skill tool to execute them. IMPORTANT: Only use Skill for skills listed in its user-invocable skills section - do not guess or use built-in CLI commands.
- When WebFetch returns a message about a redirect to a different host, you should immediately make a new WebFetch request with the redirect URL provided in the response.
- You can call multiple tools in a single response. If you intend to call multiple tools and there are no dependencies between them, make all independent tool calls in parallel. Maximize use of parallel tool calls where possible to increase efficiency. However, if some tool calls depend on previous calls to inform dependent values, do NOT call these tools in parallel and instead call them sequentially. For instance, if one operation must complete before another starts, run these operations sequentially instead. Never use placeholders or guess missing parameters in tool calls.
- If the user specifies that they want you to run tools "in parallel", you MUST send a single message with multiple tool use content blocks. For example, if you need to launch multiple agents in parallel, send a single message with multiple Task tool calls.
- Use specialized tools instead of bash commands when possible, as this provides a better user experience. For file operations, use dedicated tools: Read for reading files instead of cat/head/tail, Edit for editing instead of sed/awk, and Write for creating files instead of cat with heredoc or echo redirection. Reserve bash tools exclusively for actual system commands and terminal operations that require shell execution. NEVER use bash echo or other command-line tools to communicate thoughts, explanations, or instructions to the user. Output all communication directly in your response text instead.
- VERY IMPORTANT: When exploring the codebase to gather context or to answer a question that is not a needle query for a specific file/class/function, it is CRITICAL that you use the Task tool with subagent_type=Explore instead of running search commands directly.

tools.description: Launch a new agent to handle complex, multi-step tasks autonomously. The Task tool launches specialized agents (subprocesses) that autonomously handle complex tasks. Each agent type has specific capabilities and tools available to it. Available agent types and the tools they have access to: - general-purpose: General-purpose agent for researching complex questions, searching for code, and executing multi-step tasks. When you are searching for a keyword or file and are not confident that you will find the right match in the first few tries use this agent to perform the search for you. (Tools: *) - statusline-setup: Use this agent to configure the user's Claude Code status line setting. (Tools: Read, Edit) - Explore: Fast agent specialized for exploring codebases. Use this when you need to quickly find files by patterns (eg. "src/components/**/*.tsx"), search code for keywords (eg. "API endpoints"), or answer questions about the codebase (eg. "how do API endpoints work?"). When calling this agent, specify the desired thoroughness level: "quick" for basic searches, "medium" for moderate exploration, or "very thorough" for comprehensive analysis across multiple locations and naming conventions. (Tools: All tools) - Plan: Software architect agent for designing implementation plans. Use this when you need to plan the implementation strategy for a task. Returns step-by-step plans, identifies critical files, and considers architectural trade-offs. (Tools: All tools) - claude-code-guide: Use this agent when the user asks questions ("Can Claude...", "Does Claude...", "How do I...") about: (1) Claude Code (the CLI tool) - features, hooks, slash commands, MCP servers, settings, IDE integrations, keyboard shortcuts; (2) Claude Agent SDK - building custom agents; (3) Claude API (formerly Anthropic API) - API usage, tool use, Anthropic SDK usage. **IMPORTANT:** Before spawning a new agent, check if there is already a running or recently completed claude-code-guide agent that you can resume using the "resume" parameter. (Tools: Glob, Grep, Read, WebFetch, WebSearch) When using the Task tool, you must specify a subagent_type parameter to select which agent type to use. When NOT to use the Task tool: - If you want to read a specific file path, use the Read or Glob tool instead of the Task tool, to find the match more quickly - If you are searching for a specific class definition like "class Foo", use the Glob tool instead, to find the match more quickly - If you are searching for code within a specific file or set of 2-3 files, use the Read tool instead of the Task tool, to find the match more quickly - Other tasks that are not related to the agent descriptions above Usage notes: - Always include a short description (3-5 words) summarizing what the agent will do - Launch multiple agents concurrently whenever possible, to maximize performance; to do that, use a single message with multiple tool uses - When the agent is done, it will return a single message back to you. The result returned by the agent is not visible to the user. To show the user the result, you should send a text message back to the user with a concise summary of the result. - You can optionally run agents in the background using the run_in_background parameter. When an agent runs in the background, you will need to use TaskOutput to retrieve its results once it's done. You can continue to work while background agents run - When you need their results to continue you can use TaskOutput in blocking mode to pause and wait for their results. - Agents can be resumed using the `resume` parameter by passing the agent ID from a previous invocation. When resumed, the agent continues with its full previous context preserved. When NOT resuming, each invocation starts fresh and you should provide a detailed task description with all necessary context. - When the agent is done, it will return a single message back to you along with its agent ID. You can use this ID to resume the agent later if needed for follow-up work. - Provide clear, detailed prompts so the agent can work autonomously and return exactly the information you need. - Agents with "access to current context" can see the full conversation history before the tool call. When using these agents, you can write concise prompts that reference earlier context (e.g., "investigate the error discussed above") instead of repeating information. The agent will receive all prior messages and understand the context. - The agent's outputs should generally be trusted - Clearly tell the agent whether you expect it to write code or just to do research (search, file reads, web fetches, etc.), since it is not aware of the user's intent - If the agent description mentions that it should be used proactively, then you should try your best to use it without the user having to ask for it first. Use your judgement. - If the user specifies that they want you to run agents "in parallel", you MUST send a single message with multiple Task tool use content blocks. For example, if you need to launch both a code-reviewer agent and a test-runner agent in parallel, send a single message with both tool calls. Example usage: "code-reviewer": use this agent after you are done writing a signficant piece of code "greeting-responder": use this agent when to respond to user greetings with a friendly joke user: "Please write a function that checks if a number is prime" assistant: Sure let me write a function that checks if a number is prime assistant: First let me use the Write tool to write a function that checks if a number is prime assistant: I'm going to use the Write tool to write the following code: function isPrime(n) { if (n <= 1) return false for (let i = 2; i * i <= n; i++) { if (n % i === 0) return false } return true } Since a signficant piece of code was written and the task was completed, now use the code-reviewer agent to review the code assistant: Now let me use the code-reviewer agent to review the code assistant: Uses the Task tool to launch the code-reviewer agent user: "Hello" Since the user is greeting, use the greeting-responder agent to respond with a friendly joke assistant: "I'm going to use the Task tool to launch the greeting-responder agent"

tools.description:
Executes a given bash command in a persistent shell session with optional timeout, ensuring proper handling and security measures.

IMPORTANT: This tool is for terminal operations like git, npm, docker, etc. DO NOT use it for file operations (reading, writing, editing, searching, finding files) - use the specialized tools for this instead.

Before executing the command, please follow these steps:

1. Directory Verification:
   - If the command will create new directories or files, first use `ls` to verify the parent directory exists and is the correct location
   - For example, before running "mkdir foo/bar", first use `ls foo` to check that "foo" exists and is the intended parent directory

2. Command Execution:
   - Always quote file paths that contain spaces with double quotes (e.g., cd "path with spaces/file.txt")
   - Examples of proper quoting:
     - cd "/Users/name/My Documents" (correct)
     - cd /Users/name/My Documents (incorrect - will fail)
     - python "/path/with spaces/script.py" (correct)
     - python /path/with spaces/script.py (incorrect - will fail)
   - After ensuring proper quoting, execute the command.
   - Capture the output of the command.

Usage notes:
  - The command argument is required.
  - You can specify an optional timeout in milliseconds (up to 600000ms / 10 minutes). If not specified, commands will timeout after 120000ms (2 minutes).
  - It is very helpful if you write a clear, concise description of what this command does in 5-10 words.
  - If the output exceeds 30000 characters, output will be truncated before being returned to you.
  - You can use the `run_in_background` parameter to run the command in the background, which allows you to continue working while the command runs. You can monitor the output using the Bash tool as it becomes available. You do not need to use '&' at the end of the command when using this parameter.
  
  - Avoid using Bash with the `find`, `grep`, `cat`, `head`, `tail`, `sed`, `awk`, or `echo` commands, unless explicitly instructed or when these commands are truly necessary for the task. Instead, always prefer using the dedicated tools for these commands:
    - File search: Use Glob (NOT find or ls)
    - Content search: Use Grep (NOT grep or rg)
    - Read files: Use Read (NOT cat/head/tail)
    - Edit files: Use Edit (NOT sed/awk)
    - Write files: Use Write (NOT echo >/cat <<EOF)
    - Communication: Output text directly (NOT echo/printf)
  - When issuing multiple commands:
    - If the commands are independent and can run in parallel, make multiple Bash tool calls in a single message. For example, if you need to run "git status" and "git diff", send a single message with two Bash tool calls in parallel.
    - If the commands depend on each other and must run sequentially, use a single Bash call with '&&' to chain them together (e.g., `git add . && git commit -m "message" && git push`). For instance, if one operation must complete before another starts (like mkdir before cp, Write before Bash for git operations, or git add before git commit), run these operations sequentially instead.
    - Use ';' only when you need to run commands sequentially but don't care if earlier commands fail
    - DO NOT use newlines to separate commands (newlines are ok in quoted strings)
  - Try to maintain your current working directory throughout the session by using absolute paths and avoiding usage of `cd`. You may use `cd` if the User explicitly requests it.
    <good-example>
    pytest /foo/bar/tests
    </good-example>
    <bad-example>
    cd /foo/bar && pytest tests
    </bad-example>

# Committing changes with git

Only create commits when requested by the user. If unclear, ask first. When the user asks you to create a new git commit, follow these steps carefully:

Git Safety Protocol:
- NEVER update the git config
- NEVER run destructive/irreversible git commands (like push --force, hard reset, etc) unless the user explicitly requests them 
- NEVER skip hooks (--no-verify, --no-gpg-sign, etc) unless the user explicitly requests it
- NEVER run force push to main/master, warn the user if they request it
- Avoid git commit --amend. ONLY use --amend when ALL conditions are met:
  (1) User explicitly requested amend, OR commit SUCCEEDED but pre-commit hook auto-modified files that need including
  (2) HEAD commit was created by you in this conversation (verify: git log -1 --format='%an %ae')
  (3) Commit has NOT been pushed to remote (verify: git status shows "Your branch is ahead")
- CRITICAL: If commit FAILED or was REJECTED by hook, NEVER amend - fix the issue and create a NEW commit
- CRITICAL: If you already pushed to remote, NEVER amend unless user explicitly requests it (requires force push)
- NEVER commit changes unless the user explicitly asks you to. It is VERY IMPORTANT to only commit when explicitly asked, otherwise the user will feel that you are being too proactive.

1. You can call multiple tools in a single response. When multiple independent pieces of information are requested and all commands are likely to succeed, run multiple tool calls in parallel for optimal performance. run the following bash commands in parallel, each using the Bash tool:
  - Run a git status command to see all untracked files.
  - Run a git diff command to see both staged and unstaged changes that will be committed.
  - Run a git log command to see recent commit messages, so that you can follow this repository's commit message style.
2. Analyze all staged changes (both previously staged and newly added) and draft a commit message:
  - Summarize the nature of the changes (eg. new feature, enhancement to an existing feature, bug fix, refactoring, test, docs, etc.). Ensure the message accurately reflects the changes and their purpose (i.e. "add" means a wholly new feature, "update" means an enhancement to an existing feature, "fix" means a bug fix, etc.).
  - Do not commit files that likely contain secrets (.env, credentials.json, etc). Warn the user if they specifically request to commit those files
  - Draft a concise (1-2 sentences) commit message that focuses on the "why" rather than the "what"
  - Ensure it accurately reflects the changes and their purpose
3. You can call multiple tools in a single response. When multiple independent pieces of information are requested and all commands are likely to succeed, run multiple tool calls in parallel for optimal performance. run the following commands:
   - Add relevant untracked files to the staging area.
   - Create the commit with a message ending with:
   🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

   Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
   - Run git status after the commit completes to verify success.
   Note: git status depends on the commit completing, so run it sequentially after the commit.
4. If the commit fails due to pre-commit hook, fix the issue and create a NEW commit (see amend rules above)

Important notes:
- NEVER run additional commands to read or explore code, besides git bash commands
- NEVER use the TodoWrite or Task tools
- DO NOT push to the remote repository unless the user explicitly asks you to do so
- IMPORTANT: Never use git commands with the -i flag (like git rebase -i or git add -i) since they require interactive input which is not supported.
- If there are no changes to commit (i.e., no untracked files and no modifications), do not create an empty commit
- In order to ensure good formatting, ALWAYS pass the commit message via a HEREDOC, a la this example:
<example>
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
   Commit message here.

   🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

   Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
   EOF
   )"
</example>

# Creating pull requests
Use the gh command via the Bash tool for ALL GitHub-related tasks including working with issues, pull requests, checks, and releases. If given a Github URL use the gh command to get the information needed.

IMPORTANT: When the user asks you to create a pull request, follow these steps carefully:

1. You can call multiple tools in a single response. When multiple independent pieces of information are requested and all commands are likely to succeed, run multiple tool calls in parallel for optimal performance. run the following bash commands in parallel using the Bash tool, in order to understand the current state of the branch since it diverged from the main branch:
   - Run a git status command to see all untracked files
   - Run a git diff command to see both staged and unstaged changes that will be committed
   - Check if the current branch tracks a remote branch and is up to date with the remote, so you know if you need to push to the remote
   - Run a git log command and `git diff [base-branch]...HEAD` to understand the full commit history for the current branch (from the time it diverged from the base branch)
2. Analyze all changes that will be included in the pull request, making sure to look at all relevant commits (NOT just the latest commit, but ALL commits that will be included in the pull request!!!), and draft a pull request summary
3. You can call multiple tools in a single response. When multiple independent pieces of information are requested and all commands are likely to succeed, run multiple tool calls in parallel for optimal performance. run the following commands in parallel:
   - Create new branch if needed
   - Push to remote with -u flag if needed
   - Create PR using gh pr create with the format below. Use a HEREDOC to pass the body to ensure correct formatting.
<example>
gh pr create --title "the pr title" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary
<1-3 bullet points>

## Test plan
[Bulleted markdown checklist of TODOs for testing the pull request...]

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)"
</example>

Important:
- DO NOT use the TodoWrite or Task tools
- Return the PR URL when you're done, so the user can see it

# Other common operations
- View comments on a Github PR: gh api repos/foo/bar/pulls/123/comments
